title:
On even $K$-groups over $p$-adic Lie extensions of global function
  fields
abstract:
Let $p$ be a fixed prime number, and $F$ a global function field of
characteristic not equal to $p$. In this paper, we shall study the growth of
the Sylow $p$-subgroups of the even $K$-groups in a $p$-adic Lie extension of
$F$, where the $p$-adic Lie extension is assumed to contain the cyclotomic
$\mathbb{Z}_p$-extension of $F$. We also establish a duality between the direct
limit and inverse limit of the even $K$-groups.
